fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Regional Policy, External Relations, Trans-European Networks
eu_initiatives: Advising local authorities in member state to apply to european funds. Advising the local authorities about development of policies in the topics of employment, social inclustion, integration of migrants.Supporting consultant companies in apply to technical assistance public procurement in IPA programs, Europe AID and Regional development policies.
goals__remit: Advising to small and business enterprices to develop business model and apply to european and national/regional funds for smes. Advising local authorities in member state to apply to european funds. Advising the local authorities about development of policies in the topics of employment, social inclustion, integration of migrants. Providing indipendent study and analysis about the same topics. Project/Programme management of project cofinanced by european funds such as ESIF, H2020,SMEInstrument etc. Supporting consultant companies in apply to technical assistance public procurement in IPA programs, Europe AID and Regional development policies.
